#summary Portals 4 specifications

The Portals 4.0 specification has now been finalized and is available for download from the Sandia Portals project page ([http://www.cs.sandia.gov/Portals/portals4-spec.html]).  Errata items will be posted here as they are discovered and on the Sandia project page as solutions are approved.  New drafts of the specification will appear here as appropriate.
